divs: Sighting Detailswas in one of my bedrooms and glanced out the window which faces west... i saw a very bright light that isnt usually there.. got out the binoculars to investigate closer.. i saw it for just a brief moment at that time....the following nite it appeared again in the exact spot.. once again i got the binoculars and proceded to watch it this time for about 30 min.. the next nite it wasnt there nor the following nite but 3 days later it appeared again... it shows up about 4 or 5 nites a week..... it may be hovering over that particular area all day and decends when it becomes dusk... it seems to land in the same spot. the lites upon landing ( if it is landing ) seem to get more intense, and create several colors, red blue and yellow.. i dont think it is a planet or something that belongs there as it isnt present every nite.. so that led me to watch it daily... it is extremely far away for any type of photos, as i cannot see it clear with the help of binoculars
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Minden
There were no other sightings in Minden on or around June 30th 2005
Summary: is visible between dusk approx 830 till arround 9 PM it hovers over the tahoe basin almost nitely for about 30 min then decends like a slow landing into the forest, i watch it with my binoculars but the lite is so intense i cannot make it out
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
